https://login.partner.microsoftonline.cn



Get Access Token:

1. Post https://login.partner.microsoftonline.cn/<DirectoryID or content ID>/oauth2/token
2. Add Http Head item
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
3. Add Body Contentgrant_type=client_credentials&client_id=<applicationid>&client_secret=<Your Saved Secret>&resource=<root URL>
client_credentials是固定值。
